text: Nimutabaruka mugahura na bo, bazababwira impamvu (batagiye ku rugamba). Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mwigira impamvu mutanga kuko tudashobora kwemera ibyo muvuga. Allah yamaze kutumenyesha ibyanyu. Kandi Allah azareba ibikorwa byanyu ndetse n'Intumwa ye izabireba (niba muzicuza cyangwa muzaguma mu buryarya bwanyu). Hanyuma muzasubizwa ku Mumenyi w'ibyihishe n'ibigaragara, maze abamenyeshe ibyo mwajyaga mukora.”
